TopicTitle: Kerbin orbiter's bored save files..... - second launch lucky?

Articles.Content:
welcome to the first post launch conference I am Dr Wherner Von Kerman and this is debreifing todays launch 

at lift off all systems looked nominal however as the separation occoured we didnt realise that the probe had solar pannels or the second stage didnt have enough fuel in future we will have this fixed after the launch of our KSO network of communication satilites. Correct, the guidance and communications officer agreed. 

this caused loss of video fotage of the craft correct: PAO agreed to this and the basis of the next launch was set up. 

In an effort to save costs we will not record the mission fottage

 

Edited December 31, 2017 by kerbinorbiter
